Khonkolor:

Khonkolor jumped, avoiding the sword "Thanks, bird-bot " Khonkolor 
told to Halucigen, and shot 25 times against  RazorClaw

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Halucigen::
> Halucigen traansforms out of the dust after a good rest and fires 
> four feather missiles that flew quicky and accuratly at RazorClaws 
> knee joints.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > OOC: lol ---> Kruster =P
> > 
> > ::Razorclaw::
> > He snarls as a rifle blast clips off a piece of his shoulder 
> armour, 
> > and another singes his knee. Machine gun fire pelts the ground 
and 
> > deflects off of his armour. "What a waste of energy, shooting at 
> > me!" He growls, and slashes at Khonkolor with his sonic sword.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > On 14 Apr 2001, at 5:09, airly2000@y... wrote:

> > > > OOC: rAuq here, posting from Jer's house.

> > > > ::Dead-End/Astroblast/Switchblade/Rampage/Divebomb/Razorclaw::
> > > > 
> > > > Dead-End comes out of the CR and shakes his head, "Oooo, I 
hate 
> > > go'n 
> > > > in there." He starts running behind Speedbreaker and 
Wildrider, 
> and 
> > > > transforms into car mode, roaring off with them.
> > > > ------------------
> > > > 
> > > > Astroblast has enough time to say "Uhhh oh," as a wave of 
> sharpnel 
> > > and 
> > > > plasma pelt him shaking his spaceship form 
> violently. "Megatron, I 
> > > > can't take many more hits like that," He surveils the 
exterior 
> > > damage, 
> > > > there were nasty gashes along his sides, and his armour was 
> > > charred. 
> > > > "Megatron, my scanners are still operational and are picking 
up 
> > > > several blips moving quickly towards us. If you open fire on 
> them 
> > > now, 
> > > > they can easily be terminated; they look to be missiles, but 
> they 
> > > seem 
> > > > to be heading towards the Ark." His hatch open's 
> slightly. "We'll 
> > > have 
> > > > to return to the base... take care of our trailers quickly.
> > > > 
> > > > Switchblade is thrown across the storage room as the shrapnel 
> and 
> > > > plasma bombard the ship. "Uhh." He growns as he gets to his 
> feet, 
> > > > "Astroblast, watch where you're going next time," he stomps 
> back to 
> > > > his place, grumbling about bad drivers and stuff.
> > > > ------------------

> > > > fire following him. He snarls, then fakes right and rushes

> > > > hind legs pumping, and his claws outstreched.

to

ways
